mapper.select: select r.* from sys_rest r left join sys_roles_rest rr on rr.rest_id = r.rest_id left join sys_users_roles ur on ur.role_id = rr.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = ur.user_id where u.username = #{userName}
select r.* from sys_rest r left join sys_roles_rest rr on rr.rest_id = r.rest_id where rr.role_id = #{roleId}
